name: Run PowerShell Script from ADS
description: Detects PowerShell script execution from Alternate Data Stream (ADS)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.parent.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:*Get\-Content* AND process.command_line:*\-Stream*)`
